name: Sanniti Italian Kalamata Whole Olives, 19.4 oz (550 g)
short_description: Sanniti Whole Kalamata Olives are dark purple olives with a fruity, tangy, salty taste. These olives also have a uniquely oblong shape.

Uses: This olive varietal originally comes from Greece, making them best suited to Greek and Mediterranean recipes. Use Sanniti Whole Kalamata Olives in Greek salads, with feta cheese, tomatoes and onions.

Cheese Board: Another way to enjoy Sanniti Kalamata olives is on a cheese board with soft, creamy cheeses like Brie and Camembert. Add them to a platter with other Sanniti olive varietals, like Cerignola or Castelvetrano.
Nutrition: Kalamata olives are rich in antioxidants, as well as vitamins and minerals like iron, calcium, Vitamin A, and magnesium.
Size: 19.4 oz

name: Organic Black Kalamata Olives - NON-GMO - Gluten Free - Large - Pitted - USDA Certified Organic (13.1 oz) - Product of Kalamata, Greece - Brine with Sea Salt, Water, Organic EVOO and Organic Vinegar
short_description: PERFECT FOOD FOR SANCKS - Liokareas Organic Kalamata Olives make eating fun by enjoying a healthy and all natural snack.

PREMIUM QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST - At Liokareas we've been harvesting our farm for 5 generations to bring you the highest tasting Kalamata Olive. Large almond shaped olive, purple/black in color with a strong, distinct flavor. CONTAINS NO LACTIC ACID.
DELICIOUS IN SALADS - Or appetizer plates alone or on a charcuterie board or in pasta.
GREEK OLIVE - Kalamata is a small city in Greece known for growing some of the best olives in the world.

FITS YOUR LIFESTYLE - Whatever your dietary needs, we most likely have you covered. With simple, heathy, plant-based, organic ingredients, Our olives are: Organic, GMO-Free, Gluten-Free, Wheat-Free, Nut-Free, Dairy-Free, & Vegan. A perfect low-calorie snack that fits your lifestyle.
product_description: Organic, Non GMO, Gluten Free, Pitted Kalamata Olives. These are delicious Greek olives ideal for cooking, salads, or just snacking. Kalamata is a city found in Peloponnese, Greece. The Kalamata Olives that grows in this region are known for their superior taste and quality. The Kalamata Olive is a large, dark purple olive with a smooth, meaty texture. Often used as table olives, Liokareas Kalamata Olives are preserved in Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Organic Red Wine Vinegar, Liokareas Mani Sea Salt and water. The Liokareas name- pronounced lee-o-carry-us is synonymous with olives. For more than five generations, the Liokareas family has harvested their farm the way it was harvested by family in 1875, by using traditional harvesting methods. Handpicked and hand-packed. Kalamata Olives are found only on the Peloponnese peninsula in Southern Greece. Same as the Liokareas orchard! And what olives we don’t eat or press into oil, we offer to you! For hors-d'oeuvres and your favorite dishes or salads. Our Organic Greek Pitted Kalamata Olives are packed in a simple brine of water, Organic Red Wine Vinegar, Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Organic Mani Sea Salt. Simply perfect! Kalamata Olives and their oils are naturally rich in healthy fats and antioxidants, iron and Vitamins A, E & K. Mmmm, vitamins. Which help lower risks of heart disease, diabetes, cancer and other inflammatory conditions.
